attributes.action: call a local election earlier than in 18 months time to prevent wasting the nation's time (with an uneleceted leader offering unattractive policies).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should face the wrath of the public's opinion and let the public make a difference, rather than waste everybody's times with no political improvements made.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
